test_cases.description: Validates successful login with correct credentials.

steps.action: Send POST request to /login endpoint with valid username and password.
steps.expected_result: API responds with status code 200 and a valid authentication token.

test_cases.description: Validates login failure with incorrect credentials.

steps.action: Send POST request to /login endpoint with invalid username and password.
steps.expected_result: API responds with status code 401 and an error message.

test_cases.description: Validates login failure when required fields are missing.

steps.action: Send POST request to /login endpoint with missing username or password.
steps.expected_result: API responds with status code 400 and an error message.
